About Magical

Magical is an AI-powered tool that transforms calendar invitations into a collaborative workspace for managing meetings. It offers a range of advanced features and advantages, including integrations with popular conferencing tools like Zoom and Google Meet, syncing with Notion and other applications, and advanced AI technology that suggests meeting times, generates agendas, and automates summaries and follow-ups. Additionally, Magical serves as an all-in-one meeting hub, allowing users to manage meetings, agendas, and notes directly from browser tabs. Users can also customize meeting preferences, share personalized scheduling links, and access the platform via key commands and all browsers. The tool is ideal for busy professionals seeking a streamlined solution for managing meetings and agendas, team leads aiming to improve meeting coordination and efficiency, and individuals looking to simplify their scheduling process and regain control over their time. Overall, Magical offers a user-friendly and integrated platform for smarter and faster scheduling, enhancing the meeting experience for both organizers and attendees.
